subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Giants selected Syracuse offensive lineman Justin Pugh, who is 6-foot-4 and 305 pounds. General Manager Jerry Reese liked Pugh because of his versatility.
snippet: The Giants selected Syracuse offensive lineman Justin Pugh, who is 6-foot-4 and 305 pounds. General Manager Jerry Reese liked Pugh because of his versatility.
